title: [Question] What happens if we dont collect the temporary id card after document submission?
content: So from the title, u can see I kinda messed up. Basically noone said I have to collect a temporary id card after document submission. I got to know about it from freshers grp. So now, how do we fix this? Will I be allowed to collect it on orientation day?

comments.body: Nothing's gonna happen, they'll give you official ID cards 1-2 weeks into classes.
ok nothing that serious , just show your pesu app at the entrance while coming , cet ppl got it like after 3 weeks lol , we used just show our pesu app
I didn't even know there was a temporary ID card. If you manage to solve this issue please share
Bro is there any PES WhatsApp group? And can u help me a little
Are you in discord? U can find the link there

I am not on discord, don't even know how to use it 


And one thing, civil branch still exists? I saw few seats (4) in comedk's seat availability pdf
Comedk? Is pes even in comedk? From what I know, civil branch doesn't exist anymore.  Also pes takes only through kcet and jee mains (and management quota) from what i know

Join Discord. PESU runs on discord - various clubs, events etc are all managed primarily through discord. Might want to get used to it. 

As for ComedK: PES does not take in admissions through ComedK. And there is no civil engineering anymore.
Yes sorry, its PES college not PES Uni
Yes thank you and sorry, i didn't know PES college is different and PES uni is different
